types.name: Cancer Specific Formula
types.description: Specialized formula and are designed to meet the specific nutrient needs of patients with CANCER patients

types.name: Diabetic Formula
types.description: Specialized formula and are designed to meet the specific nutrient needs of patients with DIABETIC patients

types.name: Renal Specific Formula
types.description: Specialized formula and are designed to meet the specific nutrient needs of patients with RENAL disease

types.name: Semi-elemental Formula
types.description: Contain amino acids of varying length, simple carbohydrates, and MCTs. They are partially pre-digested but not fully pre-digested.

types.name: Standard Polymeric Formula
types.description: This is also called as standard formula which is provided to those who can digest and absorb nutrients without difficulties.

types.name: Modular Protein Formula
types.description: It is created from individual macronutrient preparations called modules, are prepared for patients who require specific nutrient combinations to treat their illnesses and can meet all of a personâ€™s nutrient needs

types.name: Therapeutic Milk (PEDIA)
types.description: Intended for pediatric patients with severe acute malnutrition (SAM) in therapeutic feeding centers: F75 is only used in the initial phase of treatment (phase 1). F100 is used in the transition phase
